This Calendar serves as the final word on all deadlines, deliverables and class sessions. 

## Readings

During the course, we will read Paul Rosenbaum's book **Observation and Experiment: An Introduction to Causal Inference**, which is available as an e-book or in paperback for under $40. Please read the Preface and Chapter 1 before our first class on 2024-01-18. 

## Timing and Location

- All classes are held in Wolstein Research Building, Room 1217.
- Classes 01, 13, 14 and 15 will begin at 8:30 AM and continue until 11 AM.
- Classes 02-12 will begin at 9:00 AM and continue until 11 AM.
